appinfo_list.name: Developer
appinfo_list.value: Headspace for Meditation, Mindfulness and Sleep

app_descript:
Headspace: Meditation & Sleep

Brief: Embark on a journey to tranquility and contentment with Headspace, your personal meditation and mindfulness coach. This app serves as a sanctuary for your mental health, enabling you to find focus, breathe freely, stay serene, and foster a conducive environment for a restful sleep. Whether you're looking to alleviate stress, grasp the foundations of meditation, or establish a rejuvenating sleep cycle, Headspace is your go-to sanctuary for relaxation. Start your path to peace with this holistic meditation, mindfulness, and sleep application.
